019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery.APIResource;
023import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import java.io.Reader;
027
028/**
029 * A stub for namespaced custom objects. It uses a dynamic model
030 * (see {@link K8sDynamicModel}) for representing the object's
031 * state and can therefore be used for any kind of object, especially
032 * custom objects.
033 */
034@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
035public class K8sDynamicStub
036        extends K8sGenericStub<K8sDynamicModel, K8sDynamicModels> {
037
038    /**
039     * Instantiates a new dynamic stub.
040     *
041     * @param objectClass the object class
042     * @param objectListClass the object list class
043     * @param client the client
044     * @param context the context
045     * @param namespace the namespace
046     * @param name the name
047     */
048    public K8sDynamicStub(Class<K8sDynamicModel> objectClass,
049            Class<K8sDynamicModels> objectListClass, K8sClient client,
050            APIResource context, String namespace, String name) {
051        super(objectClass, objectListClass, client, context, namespace, name);
052
053        // Make sure that we have an adapter for our type
054        Gson gson = client.getJSON().getGson();
055        if (!checkAdapters(client)) {
056            client.getJSON().setGson(gson.newBuilder()
057                .registerTypeAdapterFactory(
058                    new K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory())
059                .create());
060        }
061    }
062
063    private boolean checkAdapters(ApiClient client) {
064        return K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory.K8sDynamicModelCreator.class
065            .equals(client.getJSON().getGson().getAdapter(K8sDynamicModel.class)
066                .getClass())
067            && K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory.K8sDynamicModelsCreator.class
068                .equals(client.getJSON().getGson()
069                    .getAdapter(K8sDynamicModels.class).getClass());
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Get a dynamic object stub. If the version in parameter
074     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
075     * matching group and kind. 
076     *
077     * @param client the client
078     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
079     * @param namespace the namespace
080     * @param name the name
081     * @return the stub if the object exists
082     * @throws ApiException the api exception
083     */
084    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
085        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
086    public static K8sDynamicStub get(K8sClient client,
087            GroupVersionKind gvk, String namespace, String name)
088            throws ApiException {
089        return K8sGenericStub.get(K8sDynamicModel.class, K8sDynamicModels.class,
090            client, gvk, namespace, name, K8sDynamicStub::new);
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Get a dynamic object stub.
095     *
096     * @param client the client
097     * @param context the context
098     * @param namespace the namespace
099     * @param name the name
100     * @return the stub if the object exists
101     * @throws ApiException the api exception
102     */
103    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
104        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
105    public static K8sDynamicStub get(K8sClient client,
106            APIResource context, String namespace, String name) {
107        return K8sGenericStub.get(K8sDynamicModel.class, K8sDynamicModels.class,
108            client, context, namespace, name, K8sDynamicStub::new);
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Creates a stub from yaml.
113     *
114     * @param client the client
115     * @param context the context
116     * @param yaml the yaml
117     * @return the k 8 s dynamic stub
118     * @throws ApiException the api exception
119     */
120    public static K8sDynamicStub createFromYaml(K8sClient client,
121            APIResource context, Reader yaml) throws ApiException {
122        var model = new K8sDynamicModel(client.getJSON().getGson(),
123            K8s.yamlToJson(client, yaml));
124        return K8sGenericStub.create(K8sDynamicModel.class,
125            K8sDynamicModels.class, client, context, model,
126            K8sDynamicStub::new);
127    }
128}
